description: From cliff +â€Ž hanger, evoking the image of someone left hanging from a cliff, thereby having an uncertain fate.

entries.meaning: (narratology) An ending or stopping point calculated to leave a story unresolved, in order to create suspense.
(by extension) An outcome which is awaited with keen anticipation, especially one which is delayed for a period of time or which is not known until the last minute.
